subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:

    according

you are to contact us today with your

)

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello! Happy new year to you too. I hope you're doing well. Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to hear about the efforts being made to ensure that citizens receive their rightful funds. Can you please provide me with more details about how this process works? I'm curious to know what steps I need to take in order to claim my funds.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: Re: Re: Attention:
body:
Thank you Dear. for your email and the explanation there in well noted.
However, I want you to understand and know that it pains me more than
what you think that its paining you when I think of what those people
has done to our dear citizens. Taking away their hard earned money for
nothing.
And its because of this that make us to map out time and effort to
fish out all these funds and put them under our control because those
underworld countries are taking advantage of our dear citizens and
deprives them their right.
And you are to stop any communication with them and forward any
message you receive from them to us here as our security agents FBI,
police INTERPOL and other forces will be on them.
However, you are to get back to us with any of these transfer method
that you may choose as your best and easiest way of receiving your
funds from the option below.
1. Bank to bank wire transfer.
2. Online transfer.
3. Cash delivery
The agents and task force of this authority who worked for the
possibility and smooth gathering of your funds from various countries
will be paid a $100 only.You can pay the fee with itunes card,
steam wallet card or Bitcoin transfer,
So once you make the option, we will give you the instruction on how
to send the $100 and the remittance commences immediately.
The only assurance and guarantee on this is that there will NEVER be
any other form of delay or charge to get this funds to you anymore. No
matter what method you may choose. If you like wire transfer, online
transfer or cash delivery, if there will be any cost for this, you can
pay it after receiving your funds but the $100 is a must pay cost
before the claim of your funds.
Thanks,
Mrs.Victoria A. Ambrose
@ Alexander Hamilton U.S. Custom House # 1 Bowling Green, New York, NY
10004, USA

subject: Re: Re: Attention:
body:
Dear A. Brose,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with this information. I can understand how frustrating it must be to see people taking advantage of others and stealing their hard-earned money. It's good to know that there are authorities like the FBI, INTERPOL, and other forces working to stop these criminals.

I appreciate your offer to help me receive my funds. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions. Could you please provide more details about the transfer methods you mentioned? How long does each method usually take? Are there any fees associated with them?

Additionally, could you explain why payment needs to be made using iTunes cards, Steam wallet cards, or Bitcoin transfer? Is there a specific reason for these payment methods?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: Re: Re: Re: Attention:
body:

subject: Re: Re: Re: Attention:
body:
Dear A. Brose,

Thank you for your response and for explaining the different methods of transferring funds. I understand that bank to bank transfer takes longer to complete, while online banking transfer is quicker and allows me to access my funds immediately. It's good to have options!

Regarding the required fee, you mentioned choosing a method that would be faster than others. Could you please provide more details about the fee? How much would it be and what is it for?

Also, you mentioned card steam wallet card or bitcoin as possible payment methods. Could you explain how these options work? I'm not very familiar with them.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Attention:
body:
Dear A. Brose,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your efforts in gathering the funds from various countries. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain why the fee can only be paid with iTunes cards, Steam wallet cards, or Bitcoin transfer? Is there a specific reason for these payment methods?

2. How much is the fee that needs to be paid? It would be helpful to know the exact amount before making any decisions.

3. Could you provide more details on how to obtain the Steam wallet card from an Apple Store? I'm not familiar with this process and would like to ensure I do it correctly.

4. Is there any alternative method of payment available? I prefer using more traditional payment methods such as bank transfers or credit cards.

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Attention:
body:

The required fee is $100 only

If you decide to send it with iTunes card or steam wallet card you can go to any Apple Store and purchase it then once you purchase it you can scratch the card and send the pictures to us,

Mrs.Victoria A. Ambrose

subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello A. Brose,

Thank you for your email and providing me with the information. I appreciate your guidance on the payment method. Just to clarify, you mentioned that the required fee can only be paid through bank to bank payment, is that correct? Can you please explain why it cannot be paid with a card or steam wallet card?

Also, could you please provide more details about the required fee? What is it for and how does it contribute to the overall process?
